questions: Is there a pair of sunglasses in the image?
Is there a mirror in the image?
Are the sunglasses under the mirror?
Are the sunglasses white in color?
Is the mirror green in color?
model_output:
yes There is a clear depiction of a pair of sunglasses in the center of the image.
no There is no mirror present; the reflection is on a reflective surface, likely not a mirror.
no The sunglasses are on top of the reflective surface; they are not under anything.
yes The frame of the sunglasses is indeed white.
no The mirror or reflective surface has a green hue, but it is not green in color itself; the green appears to be from the background.
